short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Engage your audience on LinkedIn, Twitter and Instagram with AI generated replies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use ChatGPT 4 to generate amazing replies in LinkedIn, Twitter & Instagram. Increase your audience engagement 10x with replies tailored to the user you are responding to, following proven effective social communication methods.

Top Features:
- Generate engaging replies based off of simple notes
- Engage your audience and get more followers
- Promote your brand with contextual replies
- Supports multiple languages
